page_content: The page provides information about Freegal Music, a platform for free music streaming.
The page discusses flood protection measures and policies in the canton, including structural and planning measures.

The page provides information about FriTax, a software application for filing tax returns in the canton of Freiburg.
The page provides information on building permits for agricultural constructions and the associated procedures.
The page provides information about the Tour de Suisse 2019 cycling event and its passage through the canton of Freiburg.
The page discusses the use of FriTax software for online submission of tax returns to expedite the processing during the Covid-19 pandemic.
The page discusses the impact and management of drought periods, including ecological and economic consequences.
